pkgmetadata.longdescription: # physical2logicalConvert CSS physical properties to logical.Converts margins, padding, and borders to logical values, allowing RTL and vertical languages to show correctly.## Install```commandlinepip install physical2logical```## Usage```commandlineusage: css2logical [-h] [-r | --recursive | --no-recursive] [-u | --update | --no-update] [-a | --analyze | --no-analyze] [-f FILENAME] [-l LOG] [-p PATTERN] sourceConvert CSS physical properties to logicalpositional arguments: source Path to source directory or one file. Requiredoptional arguments: -h, --help show this help message and exit -r, --recursive, --no-recursive Recursive process of all files from source directory. (default: True) -u, --update, --no-update Update files. (default: False) -a, --analyze, --no-analyze Dry Run - Create a report with all changes (without actual source file changes). (default: False) -f FILENAME, --filename FILENAME Path to file where to save reports (used only with -a | --analyze flag). (default: "./report.html") -l LOG, --log LOG Log Level: All: 0, Debug: 10, Info: 20, Warning: 30, Error: 40 (default: 0) -p PATTERN, --pattern PATTERN Comma separated list of glob patterns (default: '*.scss, *.css')```Based on https://gist.github.com/nyurik/d438cb56a9059a0660ce4176ef94576f## Report![report.png](report.png)## Example```commandlinecss2logical -u ./src/scss/```![logs.png](logs.png)![physical2logical-all-files.png](physical2logical-all-files.png)
